class CompoundItemIterator

Data Structures

class  TextManager

Detailed Description

May contain a variable number of compound items of any type. When modifying the document directly during the editor is open, don't forget to invoke Editor::Update() after the modification. For doing text operations on the document it is helpful to use the helper class MultiMediaEditorDocument::TextManager.

void MultiMediaEditorDocument::SetBottomLineGap (  UINT8  gap  ) 
 

Every line of the document may have a gap on bottom of the line. Per default the gap is set to 0.

void MultiMediaEditorDocument::SetLineAlignment (  LineAlignment  alignment  ) 
 

Sets the line alignment for the whole document. Inserted paragraphs may overwrite this line alignment. See also EditorDocument::GetLineAlignment.

void MultiMediaEditorDocument::SetTopLineGap (  UINT8  gap  ) 
 

Every line of the document may have a gap on top of the line. Per default the gap is set to 0.
